node.doctext:
Tralala PIE
Bum-pa-dump GIN
coo-ca-choo BOOBIES
lalala KICKINASS!

Ninjagirls are so much cooler than normal girls, cause they like, throw ninja stars and wear black leather. They don't hardly like girly flower stuff at all, unless it's like a trick to put a guy off his guard sose they can kill him.




To join, send a message to [princess loulou] or [grundoon]. [{linkGroupMessages}]
node.title: ninjagirls
